name: Habitat Accessibility within Corridor (%)
functionStatement: Most habitat remains accessible without major blockages.
descriptionMarkdown: Percent of channel habitat length accessible from assessment reach within defined corridor.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Define corridor; apply barrier passability; compute accessible length รท total corridor length.
